user.title: Set up Fade Lights
user.description: This integration provides smooth light fading with automatic brightness restoration.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

fade_lights.name: Fade lights
fade_lights.description: Fades lights to a desired level over a specified transition period.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness percentage
brightness_pct.description: Target brightness level as a percentage (0-100, default 40).

transition.name: Transition time
transition.description: Transition time for fading in seconds. Accepts decimal values (default 3).

rgb_color.name: RGB color
rgb_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue] values (0-255 each).

rgbw_color.name: RGBW color
rgbw_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, white] values (0-255 each).

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW color
rgbww_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, cold_white, warm_white] values (0-255 each).

xy_color.name: XY color
xy_color.description: Target color as CIE xy coordinates [x, y] (0-1 each).

from.name: Starting values
from.description: Override starting values. Accepts brightness_pct and one color parameter.
